group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]It's not working... None of@our magic is getting through!

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]Things may look grim now, but in@the future that Mabayu saw...

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]The truth is, in the future I saw,@we weren't able to beat Walpurgisnacht...

group_1.textAvCenter: [fontSize:20]My name is Homura Akemi.@Pleased to meet you.
[fontSize:20]Mind if I wrap up a bit of work?
[fontSize:20]I'm sure it's not all that unusual.
[fontSize:20]Wishing for something so strongly@you'd gladly trade your life for it...
[fontSize:20]There must be countless people in this world@who have such wishes in their hearts.
[fontSize:20]Images are playing in my head...@But I've never seen them before.
[fontSize:20]This is what will happen@if you don't abandon hope...
[fontSize:20]Some role model I'm supposed to be.
[fontSize:20]I'm really no good at this, am I?
[fontSize:20]Listen, kid—you've got this whole thing@all wrong from the get-go.
[fontSize:20]Ever heard of the food chain?@They taught you about it in school, right?
[fontSize:20]Witches eat weak humans.@And in turn, we eat those Witches.

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]Stop being such a fool! There are so many@people who would grieve if you died.
[fontSize:20]What about the people who are@trying so hard to protect you?!

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Madoka...do you know what the word@"entropy" means?

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]I'm fine. I'm not even@breaking a sweat yet.

group_1.textAvCenter: [fontSize:20] Please stop...!@How does this future come about?
[fontSize:20]Miss Akemi... She really wanted@to save Miss Kaname so badly...
[fontSize:20]All for it to end like this?@That's too cruel...
[fontSize:20]Failing over and over,@repeating tragedy after tragedy...
[fontSize:20]It hurt so much, didn't it?@It must have been awful.
[fontSize:20]I was summoned from the future,@beyond the end of this film.

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]I'm going to become a Magical Girl.

group_1.textAvCenter: [fontSize:20]They believed in hope as Magical Girls...@I don't want to see them cry.
[fontSize:20]I want them to be smiling@to the very end...
[fontSize:20]If any rule or law stands in the way of that,@I will destroy it. I will rewrite it.
[fontSize:20]That is my prayer...@That is my wish.

group_1.Fnarration: "My wish was to erase all Witches..."

group_1.textAvCenter: [fontSize:20]And if that prayer really comes true...
[fontSize:20]...then even I should have@no reason to despair...
[fontSize:20]A time paradox...?@All the girls we recruited...
[fontSize:20]They're all being saved before they@become Witches and succumb to despair...
[fontSize:20]Is this the power of your wish,@Miss Kaname?
[fontSize:20]It is not all down to me.
[fontSize:20]The reason Homura found her way@to this future...
[fontSize:20]...was not my doing, but because she sought@to help Sayaka, Mami, and Nagisa...
[fontSize:20]...instead of abandoning them to their fates.
[fontSize:20]And because you were there by her side.
[fontSize:20]It's because you both held on to hope.
[fontSize:20]It was your prayers that called upon@my magic to reverse fate.
[fontSize:20]Then...I have no reason to despair, either?
[fontSize:20]It's your prayers that lead to this future.
[fontSize:20]Come, let's watch the rest@of this lost film together.
[fontSize:20]I don't have to give up hope.

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]The future can't be changed once seen...@Yeah, that was a lie.
[fontSize:20]My magic had the power to change@the future all along.
[fontSize:20]The future I see in my films@already factors in my foresight.
[fontSize:20]So if I erase the memories@of what I've seen...
[fontSize:20]...and edit out my memories of despair...
[fontSize:20]I cut the film that I saw in your eyes.
[fontSize:20]The outcome of our battle with@Walpurgisnacht is shrouded in darkness.

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]So that future you said you saw@where we had a crushing victory...

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]It was probably a lie.@I don't remember the details, anyway.

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]I always knew you weren't telling the truth.

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Miss Kaname, can you back us up from here on?
[fontSize:20]Miss Mami and I can handle Walpurgisnacht.
[fontSize:20]You stay here and protect Miss Akemi.
[fontSize:20]Don't worry. Mabayu predicted everything.@You can leave it to us seniors.

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]I'll support you as best as I can!

group_1.Fnarration: (Mami and I take to the sky together.)
(This time,@to fight a battle as yet undecided.)
(I can read every move that Mami makes...)
(And she seems to be@anticipating my moves, too...)

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]You land the finishing blow, Miss Mami.

group_1.Fnarration: (This technique is born from all the@time we've spent together...)
(Mami pours every last ounce of her strength@into an all-out attack,@which streaks down the path I carved...)
